entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Articque operates in the dynamic and sprawling Location Intelligence market...

entities.characteristics: robust and continued growth; dynamic and sprawling
keyDrivers: Refine customer knowledge through geospatial insights
Leverage operational excellence through more accurate decision making
Enhance business data intelligence by bringing geography into business data
Improve grasp of business environment by blending multiple data sources

entities.name: Location Intelligence (LI) solutions
entities.description: Location Intelligence platforms are at the junction of several business discipline areas: Business Intelligence, Geographic Information System (GIS), Extract-Transform-Load, Consulting. Positioning diagram source: Management.

entities.name: Location Intelligence (LI)
entities.description: Technology that unlocks and fuels business possibilities by refining customer knowledge through geospatial insights, leveraging operational excellence, enhancing business data intelligence by bringing geography into business data, and improving grasp of business environment by blending multiple data sources.

entities.name: Business Intelligence (BI)
entities.description: LI solutions provide valuable decision-support software enabling corporate users to analyze and anticipate key trends in their business with dynamic reports.

entities.name: Geographic Information System (GIS)
entities.description: LI solutions provide unique capabilities contributing a GIS layer on top of business data.

entities.name: Extract-Transform-Load (ETL)
entities.description: LI solutions provide data collection, parsing and dissemination capabilities. Indicated as 'Ongoing Development' in the positioning diagram.

entities.name: Consulting
entities.description: LI solutions create a wealth of new opportunities across a wide range of consulting applications including market analysis, site selection, observatories, and more...
